00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Name: IRenderable
00058 // Desc: Interface to a class with Render function
00059 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 class IRenderable
00061 {
00062 public:
00063         bool autorenderenabled;
00064 
00065         IRenderable()
00066         {
00067                 autorenderenabled = true;
00068         };
00069         void RegisterForRendering(int wndidx, RenderType rendertype);
00070         void DeregisterFromAutorendering(int wndidx, RenderType rendertype);
00071         virtual void Render(const OutputWindow* wnd, RenderType rendertype) = 0;
00072 };
